title: NEED HELP, getting banned cause computer crashes
body: so i join a game and get into loading screen, i have a youtube video or even itunes playing in the background and then the computer crashes. my computer makes a f**ked off sound then i have to restart it. computer specs are i7 core, 8gb ram, 1Tb hdd and nvidia geforce gtx. really dont know whats going on, could be the graphics card

replies.body:
It sounds like *Game DVR* is killing your computer's positive vibes due to the Windows 10 Anniversary update. You should be able to resolve this by disabling the game bar with [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if this helped.
